duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the fire & fabrication customer group
Assist in behind-the-scenes sales functions such as answering sales calls, addressing customer concerns, and recommending products
Provide hands-on assistance on an as-needed basis such as helping assist customers on the parts counter and providing backup support in the warehouse
Present job quotes, provide accurate pricing and inventory information to customers
Use customer relationship management (CRM) system and phone system effectively
Work together with Sales associates to provide outstanding customer service for both existing and prospective customers

education_certification.credential: 0-3 years sales and/or customer service experience preferred
